Reviews.Title: lg decoy
Reviews.Author: lavina
Reviews.Content: the blue tooth does not hold a charge  has been like this from day one but with my husbands health (4th stage head and neck cancer and most recently a blockage leading to his kidney) I found no time to write. I paid more for this than I Did the original one and it was my understanding that this was new. There were used ones of 30 to 40 dollars that probably would have worked just as well  thank you
